trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" /> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> classe é uma classe auxiliar interno usada com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" />-derived control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um construtor de controle personalizado para um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" />-derivado de controle, você precisa herdar dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder" /> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> class is an internal helper class used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder> classe é uma classe auxiliar interno usada com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether white-space literals are allowed.
This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para ignorar espaço em branco no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the literal string of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" /> control must be HTML decoded.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder.HtmlDecodeLiterals%2A> method to determine whether the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxControlBuilder.HtmlDecodeLiterals%2A> método para determinar se a cadeia de caracteres literal a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle deve ser decodificado de HTML.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method always returns `true` to indicate that the literal string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control must be HTML decoded.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação do método sempre retorna `true` para indicar que a cadeia de caracteres literal a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controle deve ser decodificado de HTML.
